issue.title: [Rust] Expose CSV and JSON reader schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's sometimes convenient to be able to view a datasource's schema without reading the first record batch. This is a proposal to create a `pub fn schema(&self) -> Arc<Schema>` on the various readers that we support.

I think this would also enable schema inference in datafusion
